meanings.definition: A type of freshwater protozoan that has radiating pseudopodia.
meanings.sent1: The heliozoan captured tiny organisms with its pseudopodia.
meanings.sent2: I observed a heliozoan under the microscope in biology class.
meanings.sent3: The heliozoan waved its pseudopodia like little arms, trying to catch food.
meanings.sent4: In the world of the pond, the heliozoan was like a tiny hunter with its pseudopodia.
meanings.sent5: The teacher showed us a video of a heliozoan extending its pseudopodia to catch prey.

meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the heliozoan behavior in the lab.

meanings.sent3: It was a heliozoan party, with everyone imitating the movements of the protozoan.
meanings.sent4: Her personality was as diverse and intricate as a heliozoan colony.
